Properties Methods Events Config Options Direct Link 
Filter
  StringFilter

Class Ext.ux.grid.filter.StringFilter

Package:Ext.ux.grid.filter
Defined In:StringFilter.js
Class:StringFilter
Extends:Filter
Filter by a configurable Ext.form.TextField

Example Usage:

var filters = new Ext.ux.grid.GridFilters({
    ...
    filters: [{
        // required configs
        type: 'string',
        dataIndex: 'name',
        
        // optional configs
        value: 'foo',
        active: true, // default is false
        iconCls: 'ux-gridfilter-text-icon' // default
        // any Ext.form.TextField configs accepted
    }]
});

Config OptionsDefined By
 active : Boolean
Indicates the initial status of the filter (defaults to false).

The Ext.data.Store dataIndex of the field this filter represents. The dataIndex does not actually have to exist in the store.

The iconCls to be applied to the menu item. Defaults to 'ux-gridfilter-text-icon'.

 updateBuffer : Number
Number of milliseconds to wait after user interaction to fire an update. Only supported by filters: 'list', 'numeric...
Number of milliseconds to wait after user interaction to fire an update. Only supported by filters: 'list', 'numeric', and 'string'. Defaults to 500.

 serialize : ( Array/Object data, Ext.ux.grid.filter.Filter filter )
Fires after the serialization process. Use this to attach additional parameters to serialization data before it is en...
Fires after the serialization process. Use this to attach additional parameters to serialization data before it is encoded and sent to the server.
Listeners will be called with the following arguments:
  • data : Array/Object
    A map or collection of maps representing the current filter configuration.
  • filter : Ext.ux.grid.filter.Filter
    The filter being serialized.
Filter
